chunks.text: Enterprise Plan Details For Teams of 25+ Users Why Enterprise? ClearPath Enterprise is designed for large organizations that need advanced security, dedicated support, and enterprise-grade reliability. Our Enterprise plan includes everything in Pro plus additional features for compliance, customization, and scale. Enterprise-Exclusive Features Category Features Security & Compliance  Single Sign-On (SAML 2.0, OAuth 2.0)  Advanced audit logs with 2-year retention  IP whitelisting and geo-restrictions  Session management and forced logouts  Data residency options (US, EU, APAC)  SOC 2 Type II compliance reports Administration  Advanced role-based access control (RBAC)  Custom user roles and permissions  Bulk user provisioning and deprovisioning  SCIM integration for user management  Centralized billing across workspaces Customization  Unlimited custom workflows  Custom fields (unlimited)  White-label options (custom domain, logo)  API rate limits: 10,000 requests/hour  Webhook retries and custom retry logic Support & SLA  99.9% uptime SLA with credits  Dedicated Customer Success Manager  24/7 priority support (phone, email, chat)  1-hour response time for critical issues  Quarterly business reviews  Direct access to engineering for escalations Onboarding  Dedicated onboarding specialist  Custom implementation plan  Live training sessions for admins and users  Free migration from existing tools  Post-launch check-ins (30/60/90 days) Pricing Enterprise pricing is customized based on your team size, feature requirements, and contract length. Minimum commitment is 12 months. Typical starting price is $2,500/month for teams of 50-100 users. Pricing Factors:  Number of users (billed annually per user)  Storage requirements (500GB included, additional at $0.10/GB/month)  Data residency requirements  Support level (standard Enterprise or Premium Enterprise)  Custom feature development needs For context, our Pro plan is $45/month for teams up to 25 users. Enterprise pricing typically ranges from $50-150 per user per year depending on volume and features selected. Contract Terms Contract Length: Minimum 12-month commitment. Discounts available for:  24-month contracts: 10% discount  36-month contracts: 20% discount Payment Terms: Annual prepayment (most common) or quarterly invoicing available. NET 30 payment terms for invoices. ACH, wire transfer, or credit card accepted. Renewal: Contracts auto-renew unless notice is provided 60 days before renewal date. Pricing is locked for contract duration; renewal pricing may increase based on CPI or 5% annually, whichever is less. Security & Compliance ClearPath Enterprise meets the security and compliance requirements of Fortune 500 companies:  SOC 2 Type II: Annual audits, reports available under NDA  GDPR Compliant: Data Processing Agreements (DPA) available  CCPA Compliant: California privacy rights supported  HIPAA: Business Associate Agreements available for healthcare customers  ISO 27001: Certification in progress (expected Q2 2024)  Penetration Testing: Annual third-party security assessments Data Encryption: AES-256 at rest, TLS 1.3 in transit. Customer-managed encryption keys available for Premium Enterprise customers. Migration Support Our team handles your migration from start to finish at no additional cost: 1. Discovery (Week 1): Audit your current tools and data structure 2. Planning (Week 2): Create detailed migration plan and timeline 3. Data Mapping (Week 3): Map fields, workflows, and integrations 4. Test Migration (Week 4): Migrate subset of data to staging environment 5. Full Migration (Week 5-6): Complete data migration during agreed maintenance window 6. Validation (Week 7): Verify data integrity and user acceptance testing Average migration timeline: 6-8 weeks. We support migrations from Jira, Asana, Monday.com, Trello, Basecamp, and most other project management tools. Custom migrations from proprietary systems available. Success Metrics Our Enterprise customers see measurable results:  40% reduction in project planning time  60% improvement in cross-team visibility  25% increase in on-time project delivery  98% user adoption within 90 days Get Started Ready to explore Enterprise? Contact our sales team:  Email: enterprise@clearpath.io  Phone: 1-888-555-0123  Schedule a demo: clearpath.io/enterprise-demo We'll schedule a discovery call to understand your needs and provide a custom quote within 2 business days.
